basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=20 µg/ml), Bacillus cereus (MIC=10 µg/ml), Micrococcus luteus (MIC=10 µg/ml), Enterococcus faecalis (MIC=50 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=30 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=50 µg/ml).Fungi:Aspergillus niger, Fusarium solani, Fusarium oxysporum.
